name: Roots (GGJ19)
description:
Roots a game for the annual Global Game Jam (2019) made in 48 hours.
Theme: What home means to you

Dusty our small rock starts a journey to find his home, as soon as his journey starts he finds Weedy a little plant that was being attack by an evil creature. Weedy with her leaf can fight but she is too weak alone, Dusty with his great defense but weak power protects her.

Roots gives us a story where social boundaries are broken. 

Dusty and Weedy fight through a difficult world with only one mision...  Find Dusty's home after he wakes up not knowing where he is. 

This is a multiplayer game that can be played by two people on PC with keyboard and mouse.

Start the adventure, protect each other and find what home means to you...

Credits
Marco Elizondo: Programmer.
Miguel García: 2D Artist.
Adrian Aragon: 3D Artist.

Music by John Leonard French From Ultimate Game Music Collection
